tool_description: Analyzes color contrast ratios between text and background colors to ensure WCAG AA and AAA compliance.

html_content.description: HTML content to analyze for color contrast

css_styles.description: Associated CSS styles for the HTML content

compliance_level.description: WCAG compliance level to check: AA or AAA

check_large_text.description: Whether to apply large text contrast requirements

ignore_transparent.description: Whether to skip elements with transparent backgrounds

error_messages: Invalid HTML content: Provide valid HTML with text elements to analyze.
Invalid compliance level: Use 'AA' or 'AAA' for WCAG compliance level.
CSS parsing error: The provided CSS contains syntax errors.
usage: Provide HTML content and optionally CSS styles to analyze color contrast ratios. Specify WCAG compliance level and configure large text and transparency handling.

passing_elements.description: Number of elements meeting contrast requirements

failing_elements.description: Number of elements failing contrast requirements

contrast_violations.description: List of specific contrast violations with ratios
